long_description: Heading out for a picnic? Sling the Picnic Blanket from Picnic At Ascot over your shoulder and you're good to go. The fleece blanket with its water-resistant backing rolls up into a tidy self-carrier. Outdoor polyester fleece picnic blanket with water-resistant backing measures 58 x 53 in. Easy rip-and-stick closure turns the blanket into a self-carrier. Comes with a carry handle and adjustable shoulder strap.
short_description: Heading out for a picnic? Sling the Picnic Blanket from Picnic At Ascot over your shoulder and you're good to go. The fleece blanket with its water-resistant backing rolls up into a tidy self-carrier.
